"Where, pending a partition action,: persons the shares to which he will be declared entitled in the action,

a co-owner gifts: automatically to  the donees when the final decree is entered.  It  is not
necessary that the interests which the donees obtained on the Deed
of gift should be expressly conserved to them in the final decree,  even

"Where, pending a partition action,: though they intervened in the action."
